page.title: 01NORTH KILWORTH GENERAL INF.
page.content: {Situation:}-At the junction of the Lutterworth-Market Harborough and the Rugby-Leicester roads. { }Half way along summit level of the old Grand Union Canal,Leicester Arm. {Population. }About 500. {Shops}Post Office,Station Rd. Walsom's General Stores,Main St. {Garages.}Howkin's(Shell)(Repairs) Sambrook's(Mobil)(Repairs) Goodman's(Ultramar)(Repairs) Cook's,Back Lane(Repairs) {Places of Worship.} St.Andrew's-Church of England Union Chapel,Methodist,Main St {School.}St. Andrew's C.E.(Aided) J&I {Public Houses.}The Swan,The White Lion {Clubs with Premises.}The Bowls Club. North Kilworth Sports Club {Halls} The Village Hall, Church St.
